lore: This creature was not designed for war, but to protect the belongings of a wealthy merchant who wanted to punish anyone foolish enough to rob him. Any living being who touches this Golem will suffer excruciating pain throughout the body for three days. For the rest of the thief's life, trying to steal from anyone will cause them to suffer another episode. Nowadays, everyone knows the story and thieves simply ignore such Golems.
menagerieDialog: (It's so still that you're not even sure it's still alive.)
(This creature has the best of intentions, but it always seems to be clumsily knocking things over.)
(Perhaps someday, you'll be able to take the time to teach it how to talk.)
(Its facial expressions are difficult to read. You can't help but think that it's judging you sometimes.)
name: Gold Golem
